Package invoice

package invoice
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Invoice
    The Invoice class represents an invoice associated with a rental transaction for a bike.
    InvoiceController
    The InvoiceController class provides methods to manage and interact with invoices.
    InvoiceHandlers
    The InvoiceHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for invoice-related endpoints.
    InvoiceHandlers.CreateInvoiceHandler
    HTTP handler for creating a new invoice.
    InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceByCustomerIdHandler
    HTTP handler for retrieving invoices associated with a specific customer.
    InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceByIdHandler
    HTTP handler for retrieving information about an invoice by its ID.
    InvoiceHandlers.InvoiceListHandler
    HTTP handler for retrieving a list of all invoices.
    InvoiceLayer
    The InvoiceLayer class provides access to invoice data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
    InvoiceValidation
    The InvoiceValidation class provides methods for validating invoice-related operations.
